data.name: Totally Normal Boyfriend ðŸ”ª
data.detailed_description:
YOU WORK IN A SMALL CAFE. THINGS START TO GET WEIRD.

A warm summer morning, 10 AM, I guess it's time to work? You boyfriend Mike is worrying about you, these last events made you spend some days in bed from overwork. You responded with a smile on your face:

- "It's okay, I'm feeling wonderful."
- "Good, but don't make people close to you worry."
Please, don't make Mike worry, and then, maybe, you'll be fine.
data.about_the_game:
YOU WORK IN A SMALL CAFE. THINGS START TO GET WEIRD.

A warm summer morning, 10 AM, I guess it's time to work? You boyfriend Mike is worrying about you, these last events made you spend some days in bed from overwork. You responded with a smile on your face:

- "It's okay, I'm feeling wonderful."
- "Good, but don't make people close to you worry."
Please, don't make Mike worry, and then, maybe, you'll be fine.
data.short_description: Totally Normal Boyfriend is a visual novel/dating simulator about your loving and caring boyfriend that would do anything for you.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
